summary: Comprehensive testing of OCR Hub Image to Text converter completed. Image OCR processing works perfectly, but PDF processing is completely broken due to PDF.js worker loading failure (404 error). This is a CRITICAL issue as PDF processing was the main reported bug.

critical_bugs.issue: PDF.js worker fails to load with 404 error from CDN (https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/pdf.js/5.4.296/pdf.worker.min.js)
critical_bugs.impact: All PDF uploads fail silently - users can upload PDFs but processing fails with no user-friendly error message
critical_bugs.error_details: Console errors: 'Setting up fake worker failed', 'Failed to convert PDF to images'
critical_bugs.user_experience: PDF files are accepted and previewed correctly, but processing fails without clear feedback

ui_bugs.issue: Copy functionality fails in automated testing due to browser security restrictions
ui_bugs.note: This is expected behavior in automated testing environments

integration_issues.issue: PDF.js worker dependency broken - CDN resource returns 404
integration_issues.impact: Complete failure of PDF text extraction feature

passed_tests: Image OCR processing (test image with 'Hello World!' text extracted successfully)
File preview system (both image and PDF previews work)
History tracking (processed files appear in Recent Extractions)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix PDF.js worker loading issue. The CDN URL for pdf.worker.min.js returns 404. Either update to correct CDN URL, host worker file locally, or use different PDF.js configuration. PDF processing was the main reported bug and is still completely broken.

success_percentage.frontend: 75% - Image OCR works perfectly, but PDF processing (critical feature) is completely broken
success_percentage.overall: 75% - Main functionality works except for the critical PDF processing feature
